mapper.select: select level,department_name, department_no, department_parent_no, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF as child, (select NVL(sum(CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF),0) from department b start with b.department_parent_no = a.department_no connect by prior b.department_no = b.department_parent_no) leaf from department a start with department_parent_no is null connect by prior department_no = department_parent_no
select max(level) from department start with department_parent_no is null connect by prior department_no = department_parent_no
select sum(CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF) as leaf from department start with department_parent_no is null connect by prior department_no = department_parent_no
select department_name, department_no, department_parent_no , (select count(department_no) from EMPLOYEE where a.department_no = department_no) as department_people_cnt from department a
mapper.update: update department set department_name = #{department_name} where department_no = #{department_no}
mapper.delete: delete from department where department_no in (select department_no from department start with department_no = #{department_no} connect by prior department_no = department_parent_no)
